newsitem.title: BRAZIL: Eight banks prequalify for Brazil's Credireal sale.
newsitem.headline: Eight banks prequalify for Brazil's Credireal sale.

text.p: Eight banks have prequalified to participate in the privatization auction of Minas Gerais state bank Credireal, a state official said Thursday.
The list of banks will be published Friday in Brazil's main newspapers, he added.
Credireal had been expected to be privatized late April but the selloff depended on a Senate approval of a 346.3 million reais loan to capitalize the bank.
The Senate's loan authorization came only early this week.
The bank is now expected to be sold off in June or July.
